# Travel (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* | Odin, Hermod, Uller |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* | Kol Korran, the Traveler |
| | *Golarion:* | Abadar, [[Cayden Cailean]], [[Desna]] |
| | *Greyhawk:* | [[Fharlanghn]] |
| | *Kalamar:* | The Traveler, The Guardian, Eye Opener, The Watcher |
| | *Krynn:* | Shinare |
| | *Olympian:* | Hermes, Tyche |
| | *Other:* | Taiia (creator aspect) |
| | *Pharaonic:* | Ptah |
| | *Toril:* | Akadi, [[Baervan Wildwanderer]], [[Brandobaris]], [[Fenmarel Mestarine]], Gwaeron Windstrom, Hoar, Istishia, Kelemvor, Lliira, Marthammor Duin, Mielikki, Oghma, Sehanine Moonbow, Sel√ªne, Sharess, Shaundakul, Tymora, Vhaeraun, Waukeen |

**Granted Powers**: You are an explorer and find enlightenment in the simple joy of travel, be it by foot or conveyance or magic. Increase your base speed by 10 feet.

- *Agile Feet (Su)*: As a free action, you can gain increased mobility for 1 round. For the next round, you ignore all difficult terrain and do not take any penalties for moving through it. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
- *Dimensional Hop (Sp)*: At 8th level, you can teleport up to 10 feet per cleric level per day as a move action. This teleportation must be used in 5-foot increments and such movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity. You must have line of sight to your destination to use this ability. You can bring other willing creatures with you, but you must expend an equal amount of distance for each creature brought.

**Travel Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Longstrider (Spell)|Longstrider]]****:** Your speed increases by 10 ft.

**2** **[[Locate Object (Spell)|Locate Object]]****:** Senses direction toward object (specific or type).

**3** **[[Fly (Skill)|Fly]]****:** Subject flies at speed of 60 ft.

**4** **[[Dimension Door (Spell)|Dimension Door]]****:** Teleports you a short distance.

**5** **[[Teleport (Spell)|Teleport]]****:** Instantly transports you as far as 100 miles per level.

**6** **[[Find the Path (Spell)|Find the Path]]****:** Shows most direct way to a location.

**7** **[[Teleport, Greater (Spell)|Teleport, Greater]]****:** As *[[Teleport (Spell)|teleport]]*, but no range limit and no off-target arrival.

**8** **[[Phase Door (Spell)|Phase Door]]****:** Creates an invisible passage through a barrier.

**9** **[[Astral Projection (Spell)|Astral Projection]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Projects you and companions onto [[Astral Plane]].

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 47

                Deities and Demigods (WotC), pg. 215

                Dragonlance Campaign Setting (WotC), pg. 104

                Eberron Campaign Setting (WotC), pg. 108

                Player's Guide to Faerun (WotC), pg. 92

                Kingdoms of Kalamar, Player's Guide (Kenzer and Company), pg. 160
